queries.question: Какие сотрудники обработали более 3 успешных доставок через управляемые ими склады?
queries.sql_query: SELECT e.FirstName, e.LastName, COUNT(d.DeliveryID) AS DeliveriesHandled FROM Employees e JOIN Warehouses w ON e.EmployeeID = w.ManagerID JOIN Inventory i ON w.WarehouseID = i.WarehouseID JOIN OrderDetails od ON i.ProductID = od.ProductID JOIN Orders o ON od.OrderID = o.OrderID JOIN Shipments s ON o.OrderID = s.OrderID JOIN Deliveries d ON s.ShipmentID = d.ShipmentID WHERE d.Status = 'Доставлено' GROUP BY e.FirstName, e.LastName HAVING COUNT(d.DeliveryID) > 3;

FROM Employees e
JOIN Warehouses w ON e.EmployeeID = w.ManagerID
JOIN Inventory i ON w.WarehouseID = i.WarehouseID
JOIN Shipments s ON i.ProductID = s.OrderID
JOIN Deliveries d ON s.ShipmentID = d.ShipmentID
WHERE d.Status = 'Доставлено'
GROUP BY e.EmployeeID, EmployeeName, e.Title
HAVING COUNT(DISTINCT d.DeliveryID) > 3;

queries.sql_query: SELECT r.StartLocation, r.EndLocation, r.Distance, v.Model, COUNT(DISTINCT d.DeliveryID) as DeliveryCount, SUM(CASE WHEN d.Status = 'Доставлено' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as SuccessfulDeliveries FROM Routes r JOIN Vehicles v ON r.ShipperID = v.ShipperID JOIN Deliveries d ON v.VehicleID = d.VehicleID WHERE r.Status = 'Активен' GROUP BY r.StartLocation, r.EndLocation, r.Distance, v.Model LIMIT 8;

    r.RouteID,
    r.StartLocation,
    r.EndLocation,
    r.Distance,
    v.Model AS VehicleModel,
    COUNT(d.DeliveryID) AS TotalDeliveries,
    COUNT(CASE WHEN d.Status = 'Доставлено' THEN d.DeliveryID END) AS SuccessfulDeliveries
FROM 
    Routes r
JOIN 
    Shippers s ON r.ShipperID = s.ShipperID
JOIN 
    Vehicles v ON s.ShipperID = v.ShipperID
JOIN 
    Deliveries d ON v.VehicleID = d.VehicleID
GROUP BY

queries.question: Какие перевозчики имеют высокий уровень успешных доставок? Покажите топ-9 перевозчиков с наибольшим количеством успешных доставок, включая название перевозчика, общее количество отправлений, количество успешных доставок и количество транспортных средств.
queries.sql_query: SELECT s.Name as ShipperName, COUNT(DISTINCT sh.ShipmentID) as TotalShipments, COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN sh.Status = 'Доставлено' THEN sh.ShipmentID END) as SuccessfulShipments, COUNT(DISTINCT v.VehicleID) as TotalVehicles FROM Shippers s JOIN Shipments sh ON s.ShipperID = sh.ShipperID JOIN Vehicles v ON s.ShipperID = v.ShipperID GROUP BY s.Name LIMIT 9;

    sh.Name AS ShipperName,
    COUNT(DISTINCT s.ShipmentID) AS TotalShipments,
    COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN d.Status = 'Доставлено' THEN d.DeliveryID END) AS SuccessfulDeliveries,
    COUNT(DISTINCT v.VehicleID) AS TotalVehicles
FROM 
    Shippers sh
JOIN 
    Shipments s ON sh.ShipperID = s.ShipperID
JOIN 
    Deliveries d ON s.ShipmentID = d.ShipmentID

queries.sql_query: SELECT r.StartLocation, r.EndLocation, COUNT(DISTINCT d.DeliveryID) as TotalDeliveries, COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN d.Status = 'Доставлено' THEN d.DeliveryID END) as SuccessfulDeliveries, COUNT(DISTINCT v.VehicleID) as VehiclesUsed, AVG(r.Distance) as AvgRouteDistance, SUM(CASE WHEN d.Status = 'Задержка' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as DelayedDeliveries FROM Routes r JOIN Vehicles v ON r.ShipperID = v.ShipperID JOIN Deliveries d ON v.VehicleID = d.VehicleID WHERE r.Status = 'Активен' GROUP BY r.StartLocation, r.EndLocation LIMIT 5;

WITH SuccessfulDeliveries AS (
    SELECT r.RouteID, COUNT(*) AS NumSuccessfulDeliveries
    FROM Routes r
    INNER JOIN Shipments sh ON r.ShipperID = sh.ShipperID
    INNER JOIN Deliveries d ON sh.ShipmentID = d.ShipmentID
    WHERE d.Status IN ('Доставлено')
    GROUP BY r.RouteID
), AllDeliveries AS (
    SELECT r.RouteID, COUNT(*) AS NumAllDeliveries
    FROM Routes r
    INNER JOIN Shipments sh ON r.ShipperID = sh.ShipperID
    INNER JOIN Deliveries d ON sh.ShipmentID = d.ShipmentID
    GROUP BY r.RouteID
), DelayedDeliveries AS (
    SELECT r.RouteID, COUNT(*) AS NumDelayedDeliveries
    FROM Routes r
    INNER JOIN Shipments sh ON r.ShipperID = sh.ShipperID
    INNER JOIN Deliveries d ON sh.ShipmentID = d.ShipmentID
    WHERE d.Status IN ('Задержка')
    GROUP BY r.RouteID
), UsedVehicles AS (
    SELECT r.RouteID, COUNT(DISTINCT v.VehicleID) AS NumUsedVehicles
    FROM Routes r
    INNER JOIN Shipments sh ON r.ShipperID = sh.ShipperID
    INNER JOIN Deliveries d ON sh.ShipmentID = d.ShipmentID
    INNER JOIN Vehicles v ON d.VehicleID = v.VehicleID
    GROUP BY r.RouteID
)
SELECT 
    r.StartLocation, 
    r.EndLocation, 
    COALESCE(sd.NumSuccessfulDeliveries, 0) AS NumSuccessfulDeliveries,
    COALESCE(ad.NumAllDeliveries, 0) AS NumTotalDeliveries,
    COALESCE(uv.NumUsedVehicles, 0) AS NumUsedVehicles,
    ROUND(AVG(r.Distance), 2) AS AverageDistance,
    COALESCE(dd.NumDelayedDeliveries, 0) AS NumDelayedDeliveries
FROM Routes r
LEFT JOIN SuccessfulDeliveries sd ON r.RouteID = sd.RouteID
LEFT JOIN AllDeliveries ad ON r.RouteID = ad.RouteID
LEFT JOIN UsedVehicles uv ON r.RouteID = uv.RouteID
LEFT JOIN DelayedDeliveries dd ON r.RouteID = dd.RouteID
GROUP BY r.RouteID, r.StartLocation, r.EndLocation
ORDER BY NumSuccessfulDeliveries DESC
LIMIT 5;

queries.sql_query: SELECT o.OrderID, c.Name as ClientName, COUNT(DISTINCT od.ProductID) as ProductsOrdered, SUM(od.Quantity) as TotalItems, SUM(od.Quantity * od.UnitPrice) as OrderValue, COUNT(DISTINCT s.ShipmentID) as ShipmentsCount, COUNT(DISTINCT p.PaymentID) as PaymentsCount, MAX(CASE WHEN p.Status = 'Завершено' THEN p.Amount ELSE 0 END) as MaxPayment FROM Orders o JOIN Clients c ON o.ClientID = c.ClientID JOIN OrderDetails od ON o.OrderID = od.OrderID JOIN Shipments s ON o.OrderID = s.OrderID JOIN Payments p ON o.OrderID = p.OrderID WHERE o.Status = 'Доставлено' GROUP BY o.OrderID, c.Name LIMIT 8;

queries.sql_query: SELECT s.SupplierID, s.Name as SupplierName, COUNT(DISTINCT p.ProductID) as TotalProducts, SUM(CASE WHEN p.Discontinued = FALSE THEN i.Quantity ELSE 0 END) as ActiveStock, COUNT(DISTINCT o.OrderID) as TotalOrders, SUM(od.Quantity * od.UnitPrice) as TotalRevenue, AVG(pm.Amount) as AvgPaymentAmount, COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN pm.Status = 'Завершено' THEN pm.PaymentID END) as CompletedPayments FROM Suppliers s JOIN Products p ON s.SupplierID = p.SupplierID JOIN Inventory i ON p.ProductID = i.ProductID JOIN OrderDetails od ON p.ProductID = od.ProductID JOIN Orders o ON od.OrderID = o.OrderID JOIN Payments pm ON o.OrderID = pm.OrderID WHERE p.StockQuantity > 0 GROUP BY s.SupplierID, s.Name LIMIT 7;

queries.question: Каков многомерный анализ производительности складов? Покажите топ-4 склада с наибольшим количеством товаров, включая идентификатор и название склада, город, вместимость, имя менеджера, количество уникальных продуктов, общее количество товаров, количество товаров категории 'Бытовая техника', количество товаров категории 'Кухонная техника', среднюю цену продукта, общее количество отправлений и количество успешных отправлений.
queries.sql_query: SELECT w.WarehouseID, w.Name as WarehouseName, w.City, w.Capacity, COUNT(DISTINCT i.ProductID) as UniqueProducts, SUM(i.Quantity) as TotalInventory, COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN p.Category = 'Бытовая техника' THEN p.ProductID END) as AppliancesCount, COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN p.Category = 'Кухонная техника' THEN p.ProductID END) as KitchenwareCount, AVG(p.UnitPrice) as AvgProductPrice, COUNT(DISTINCT s.ShipmentID) as TotalShipments, COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN s.Status = 'Доставлено' THEN s.ShipmentID END) as SuccessfulShipments FROM Warehouses w JOIN Inventory i ON w.WarehouseID = i.WarehouseID JOIN Products p ON i.ProductID = p.ProductID JOIN Shipments s ON w.WarehouseID = s.ShipmentID GROUP BY w.WarehouseID, w.Name, w.City, w.Capacity LIMIT 4;
queries.gpt-4o_response:
SELECT 
    w.WarehouseID,
    w.Name AS WarehouseName,
    w.City,
    w.Capacity,
    CONCAT(e.FirstName, ' ', e.LastName) AS ManagerName,
    COUNT(DISTINCT i.ProductID) AS UniqueProducts,
    SUM(i.Quantity) AS TotalItems,
    SUM(CASE WHEN p.Category = 'Бытовая техника' THEN i.Quantity ELSE 0 END) AS HouseholdItems,
    SUM(CASE WHEN p.Category = 'Кухонная техника' THEN i.Quantity ELSE 0 END) AS KitchenItems,
    AVG(p.UnitPrice) AS AvgProductPrice,
    COUNT(DISTINCT s.ShipmentID) AS TotalShipments,
    COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN s.Status = 'Доставлено' THEN s.ShipmentID END) AS SuccessfulShipments
FROM 
    Warehouses w
JOIN 
    Employees e ON w.ManagerID = e.EmployeeID
JOIN 
    Inventory i ON w.WarehouseID = i.WarehouseID
JOIN 
    Products p ON i.ProductID = p.ProductID
LEFT JOIN 
    Shipments s ON w.WarehouseID = s.ShipmentID
GROUP BY 
    w.WarehouseID, w.Name, w.City, w.Capacity, ManagerName
ORDER BY 
    TotalItems DESC
LIMIT 4;

queries.question: Каков продвинутый анализ производительности сотрудников с учетом метрик доставки? Покажите топ-6 сотрудников с наибольшим количеством успешных доставок, включая идентификатор сотрудника, полное имя, должность, количество управляемых складов, общее количество отправлений, количество успешных доставок, количество управляемых транспортных средств, количество контролируемых маршрутов и среднее расстояние маршрута.
queries.sql_query: SELECT e.EmployeeID, CONCAT(e.FirstName, ' ', e.LastName) as EmployeeName, e.Title, COUNT(DISTINCT w.WarehouseID) as ManagedWarehouses, COUNT(DISTINCT s.ShipmentID) as TotalShipments, COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN s.Status = 'Доставлено' THEN s.ShipmentID END) as SuccessfulDeliveries, COUNT(DISTINCT v.VehicleID) as VehiclesManaged, COUNT(DISTINCT r.RouteID) as RoutesSupervised, AVG(r.Distance) as AvgRouteDistance FROM Employees e JOIN Warehouses w ON e.EmployeeID = w.ManagerID JOIN Shipments s ON w.WarehouseID = s.ShipmentID JOIN Routes r ON s.ShipperID = r.ShipperID JOIN Vehicles v ON r.ShipperID = v.ShipperID GROUP BY e.EmployeeID, e.FirstName, e.LastName, e.Title LIMIT 6;
queries.gpt-4o_response:
SELECT 
    e.EmployeeID, 
    CONCAT(e.FirstName, ' ', e.LastName) AS EmployeeName, 
    e.Title, 
    COUNT(DISTINCT w.WarehouseID) AS ManagedWarehouses, 
    COUNT(DISTINCT s.ShipmentID) AS TotalShipments, 
    COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN d.Status = 'Доставлено' THEN d.DeliveryID END) AS SuccessfulDeliveries, 
    COUNT(DISTINCT v.VehicleID) AS ManagedVehicles, 
    COUNT(DISTINCT r.RouteID) AS ControlledRoutes, 
    AVG(r.Distance) AS AvgRouteDistance
FROM 
    Employees e
LEFT JOIN 
    Warehouses w ON e.EmployeeID = w.ManagerID
LEFT JOIN 
    Shipments s ON e.EmployeeID = s.ShipmentID
LEFT JOIN 
    Deliveries d ON s.ShipmentID = d.ShipmentID
LEFT JOIN 
    Vehicles v ON e.EmployeeID = v.ShipperID
LEFT JOIN 
    Routes r ON e.EmployeeID = r.ShipperID
GROUP BY 
    e.EmployeeID, EmployeeName, e.Title
ORDER BY 
    SuccessfulDeliveries DESC
LIMIT 6;

queries.sql_query: SELECT v.VehicleID, v.LicensePlate, v.Model, COUNT(DISTINCT d.DeliveryID) as TotalDeliveries, COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN d.Status = 'Доставлено' THEN d.DeliveryID END) as CompletedDeliveries, COUNT(DISTINCT r.RouteID) as RoutesCovered, SUM(r.Distance) as TotalDistance, COUNT(DISTINCT s.ShipmentID) as ShipmentsHandled, COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN s.Status = 'Доставлено' THEN s.ShipmentID END) as SuccessfulShipments, AVG(r.Distance) as AvgRouteDistance FROM Vehicles v JOIN Deliveries d ON v.VehicleID = d.VehicleID JOIN Shipments s ON d.ShipmentID = s.ShipmentID JOIN Routes r ON s.ShipperID = r.ShipperID WHERE v.Status = 'В Работе' GROUP BY v.VehicleID, v.LicensePlate, v.Model LIMIT 3;

queries.gigachat_response:
WITH VehiclePerformance AS (
    -- Calculate total deliveries per vehicle
    SELECT v.VehicleID, v.LicensePlate, v.Model, COUNT(*) AS TotalDeliveries,
           SUM(CASE WHEN d.Status = 'Доставлено' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS SuccessfulDeliveries
    FROM Vehicles v
    LEFT JOIN Deliveries d ON v.VehicleID = d.VehicleID
    GROUP BY v.VehicleID, v.LicensePlate, v.Model
), 
RoutesTraveled AS (
    -- Calculate routes traveled per vehicle
    SELECT r.RouteID, r.Distance, r.ShipperID, v.VehicleID
    FROM Routes r
    INNER JOIN Shipments sh ON r.ShipperID = sh.ShipperID
    INNER JOIN Deliveries d ON sh.ShipmentID = d.ShipmentID
    INNER JOIN Vehicles v ON d.VehicleID = v.VehicleID
), 
TotalDistancePerVehicle AS (
    -- Sum up distances traveled per vehicle
    SELECT rt.VehicleID, SUM(rt.Distance) AS TotalDistance
    FROM RoutesTraveled rt
    GROUP BY rt.VehicleID
), 
AverageDistancePerRoute AS (
    -- Average distance per route per vehicle
    SELECT rt.VehicleID, AVG(rt.Distance) AS AverageDistance
    FROM RoutesTraveled rt
    GROUP BY rt.VehicleID
), 
FinalResults AS (
    -- Combine results into one table
    SELECT vp.VehicleID, vp.LicensePlate, vp.Model, vp.TotalDeliveries, vp.SuccessfulDeliveries,
           COALESCE(td.TotalDistance, 0) AS TotalDistanceTravelled,
           COALESCE(ad.AverageDistance, 0) AS AverageDistancePerRoute
    FROM VehiclePerformance vp
    LEFT JOIN TotalDistancePerVehicle td ON vp.VehicleID = td.VehicleID
    LEFT JOIN AverageDistancePerRoute ad ON vp.VehicleID = ad.VehicleID
)
-- Final output: top 3 vehicles based on total distance travelled
SELECT *
FROM FinalResults
ORDER BY TotalDistanceTravelled DESC
LIMIT 3;
queries.gigachat_response_ru:
SELECT v.VehicleID, v.LicensePlate, v.Model, 
       COUNT(DISTINCT d.DeliveryID) AS TotalDeliveries,
       COUNT(CASE WHEN d.Status = 'Доставлено' THEN d.DeliveryID END) AS SuccessfulDeliveries,
       COUNT(r.RouteID) AS TotalRoutes,
       ROUND(SUM(r.Distance), 2) AS TotalDistanceTraveled,
       COUNT(o.OrderID) AS TotalShipmentsHandled,
       COUNT(CASE WHEN o.Status IN ('Доставлено') THEN o.OrderID END) AS SuccessfulShipments,
       ROUND(AVG(r.Distance), 2) AS AverageRouteDistance
FROM Vehicles v
LEFT JOIN Deliveries d ON v.VehicleID = d.VehicleID
LEFT JOIN Shipments s ON d.ShipmentID = s.ShipmentID
LEFT JOIN Orders o ON s.OrderID = o.OrderID
LEFT JOIN Routes r ON v.VehicleID = r.ShipperID AND r.StartLocation <> r.EndLocation -- Исключаем маршруты нулевой длины
GROUP BY v.VehicleID, v.LicensePlate, v.Model
ORDER BY TotalDistanceTraveled DESC
LIMIT 3;

queries.sql_query: SELECT w.WarehouseID, w.Name as WarehouseName, p.Category, COUNT(DISTINCT i.ProductID) as UniqueProducts, SUM(i.Quantity) as TotalQuantity, AVG(p.UnitPrice) as AvgProductPrice, COUNT(DISTINCT o.OrderID) as OrdersProcessed, COUNT(DISTINCT s.ShipmentID) as ShipmentsHandled FROM Warehouses w JOIN Inventory i ON w.WarehouseID = i.WarehouseID JOIN Products p ON i.ProductID = p.ProductID JOIN Orders o ON w.WarehouseID = o.OrderID JOIN Shipments s ON o.OrderID = s.OrderID GROUP BY w.WarehouseID, w.Name, p.Category LIMIT 5;
queries.gpt-4o_response:
SELECT 
    w.WarehouseID, 
    w.Name AS WarehouseName, 
    p.Category, 
    COUNT(DISTINCT i.ProductID) AS UniqueProducts, 
    SUM(i.Quantity) AS TotalQuantity, 
    AVG(p.UnitPrice) AS AvgProductPrice, 
    COUNT(DISTINCT o.OrderID) AS ProcessedOrders, 
    COUNT(DISTINCT s.ShipmentID) AS ProcessedShipments
FROM 
    Warehouses w
JOIN 
    Inventory i ON w.WarehouseID = i.WarehouseID
JOIN 
    Products p ON i.ProductID = p.ProductID
LEFT JOIN 
    OrderDetails od ON p.ProductID = od.ProductID
LEFT JOIN 
    Orders o ON od.OrderID = o.OrderID
LEFT JOIN 
    Shipments s ON o.OrderID = s.OrderID
GROUP BY 
    w.WarehouseID, w.Name, p.Category
ORDER BY 
    TotalQuantity DESC
LIMIT 5;

queries.question: Каков комплексный анализ выполнения заказов с учетом метрик доставки? Покажите топ-7 заказов с наименьшим временем доставки за период с 1 января 2023 по 30 июня 2023, включая номер заказа, имя клиента, дату заказа, статус заказа, количество различных продуктов, общее количество единиц, стоимость заказа с учетом скидок, дату отправления, дату доставки, количество дней до доставки, название перевозчика, модель транспортного средства, расстояние маршрута и статус платежа.
queries.sql_query: SELECT o.OrderID, c.Name AS ClientName, o.OrderDate, o.Status AS OrderStatus, COUNT(DISTINCT od.ProductID) AS ProductCount, SUM(od.Quantity) AS TotalItems, SUM(od.Quantity * od.UnitPrice * (1 - od.Discount/100)) AS OrderValue, s.ShipmentDate, d.DeliveryDate, DATEDIFF(d.DeliveryDate, o.OrderDate) AS DaysToDeliver, sh.Name AS ShipperName, v.Model AS VehicleModel, r.Distance AS RouteDistance, p.Status AS PaymentStatus FROM Orders o JOIN Clients c ON o.ClientID = c.ClientID JOIN OrderDetails od ON o.OrderID = od.OrderID JOIN Shipments s ON o.OrderID = s.OrderID JOIN Deliveries d ON s.ShipmentID = d.ShipmentID JOIN Shippers sh ON s.ShipperID = sh.ShipperID JOIN Vehicles v ON d.VehicleID = v.VehicleID JOIN Routes r ON sh.ShipperID = r.ShipperID JOIN Payments p ON o.OrderID = p.OrderID WHERE o.OrderDate BETWEEN '2023-01-01' AND '2023-06-30' GROUP BY o.OrderID, c.Name, o.OrderDate, o.Status, s.ShipmentDate, d.DeliveryDate, sh.Name, v.Model, r.Distance, p.Status LIMIT 7;
queries.gpt-4o_response:
SELECT 
    o.OrderID,
    c.Name AS ClientName,
    o.OrderDate,
    o.Status AS OrderStatus,
    COUNT(DISTINCT od.ProductID) AS ProductVariety,
    SUM(od.Quantity) AS TotalUnits,
    SUM(od.Quantity * od.UnitPrice * (1 - od.Discount / 100)) AS DiscountedOrderCost,
    s.ShipmentDate,
    s.DeliveryDate,
    DATEDIFF(s.DeliveryDate, s.ShipmentDate) AS DaysToDeliver,
    sh.Name AS ShipperName,
    v.Model AS VehicleModel,
    r.Distance AS RouteDistance,
    p.Status AS PaymentStatus
FROM 
    Orders o
JOIN 
    Clients c ON o.ClientID = c.ClientID
JOIN 
    OrderDetails od ON o.OrderID = od.OrderID
JOIN 
    Shipments s ON o.OrderID = s.OrderID
JOIN 
    Shippers sh ON s.ShipperID = sh.ShipperID
JOIN 
    Deliveries d ON s.ShipmentID = d.ShipmentID
JOIN 
    Vehicles v ON d.VehicleID = v.VehicleID
JOIN 
    Routes r ON sh.ShipperID = r.ShipperID
JOIN 
    Payments p ON o.OrderID = p.OrderID
WHERE 
    o.OrderDate BETWEEN '2023-01-01' AND '2023-06-30'
    AND s.DeliveryDate IS NOT NULL
GROUP BY 
    o.OrderID, c.Name, o.OrderDate, o.Status, s.ShipmentDate, s.DeliveryDate, sh.Name, v.Model, r.Distance, p.Status
ORDER BY 
    DaysToDeliver ASC
LIMIT 7;

queries.gigachat_response:
WITH OrderMetrics AS (
    SELECT 
        o.OrderID,
        c.Name AS ClientName,
        o.OrderDate,
        o.Status AS OrderStatus,
        COUNT(DISTINCT od.ProductID) AS NumDistinctProducts,
        SUM(od.Quantity) AS TotalUnitsOrdered,
        SUM(od.Quantity * od.UnitPrice * (1 - od.Discount/100)) AS TotalDiscountedCost,
        sh.ShipmentDate,
        sh.DeliveryDate,
        DATEDIFF(sh.DeliveryDate, sh.ShipmentDate) AS DaysToDeliver,
        s.Name AS ShipperName,
        v.Model AS VehicleModel,
        r.Distance AS RouteDistance,
        p.PaymentMethod,
        p.Status AS PaymentStatus
    FROM Orders o
    INNER JOIN Clients c ON o.ClientID = c.ClientID
    INNER JOIN OrderDetails od ON o.OrderID = od.OrderID
    INNER JOIN Shipments sh ON o.OrderID = sh.OrderID
    INNER JOIN Shippers s ON sh.ShipperID = s.ShipperID
    INNER JOIN Vehicles v ON sh.ShipperID = v.ShipperID
    INNER JOIN Routes r ON s.ShipperID = r.ShipperID AND r.StartLocation = s.City AND r.EndLocation = c.City
    INNER JOIN Payments p ON o.OrderID = p.OrderID
    WHERE o.OrderDate BETWEEN '2023-01-01' AND '2023-06-30'
    GROUP BY o.OrderID, c.Name, o.OrderDate, o.Status, sh.ShipmentDate, sh.DeliveryDate, s.Name, v.Model, r.Distance, p.PaymentMethod, p.Status
)
SELECT *
FROM OrderMetrics
ORDER BY DaysToDeliver ASC
LIMIT 7;

SELECT 
    o.OrderID AS Заказ_номер,
    c.Name AS Имя_клиента,
    o.OrderDate AS Дата_заказа,
    o.Status AS Статус_заказа,
    COUNT(DISTINCT od.ProductID) AS Количество_разных_продуктов,
    SUM(od.Quantity) AS Общее_количество_единиц,
    ROUND(SUM(od.Quantity * od.UnitPrice * (1 - od.Discount/100)), 2) AS Стоимость_заказа_со_скидкой,
    sh.ShippedDate AS Дата_отправления,
    sh.DeliveryDate AS Дата_доставки,
    DATEDIFF(sh.DeliveryDate, sh.ShippedDate) AS Количествово_дней_до_доставки,
    sp.Name AS Название_перевозчик,
    v.Model AS Модель_транспортного_средства,
    r.Distance AS Расстояние_маршрута,
    p.Status AS Статус_платежа
FROM 
    Orders o
JOIN 
    Clients c ON o.ClientID = c.ClientID
JOIN 
    OrderDetails od ON o.OrderID = od.OrderID
LEFT JOIN 
    Shipments sh ON o.OrderID = sh.OrderID
LEFT JOIN 
    Shippers sp ON sh.ShipperID = sp.ShipperID
LEFT JOIN 
    Deliveries d ON sh.ShipmentID = d.ShipmentID
LEFT JOIN 
    Vehicles v ON d.VehicleID = v.VehicleID
LEFT JOIN 
    Routes r ON sp.ShipperID = r.ShipperID AND r.StartLocation = sh.ShippedFromCity AND r.EndLocation = sh.DeliveredToCity
LEFT JOIN 
    Payments p ON o.OrderID = p.OrderID
WHERE 
    o.OrderDate BETWEEN '2023-01-01' AND '2023-06-30'
GROUP BY 
    o.OrderID, c.Name, o.OrderDate, o.Status, sh.ShippedDate, sh.DeliveryDate, sp.Name, v.Model, r.Distance, p.Status

queries.question: Каков многоуровневый анализ логистической производительности по регионам? Покажите топ-6 регионов с наибольшей выручкой, включая страну, город, количество клиентов, количество заказов, среднее время доставки, количество складов в городе, общую выручку, количество успешных доставок, количество проблемных доставок и процент успешных доставок.
queries.sql_query: SELECT c.Country, c.City, COUNT(DISTINCT c.ClientID) AS ClientCount, COUNT(DISTINCT o.OrderID) AS OrderCount, AVG(DATEDIFF(s.DeliveryDate, o.OrderDate)) AS AvgDeliveryTime, (SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT w.WarehouseID) FROM Warehouses w WHERE w.City = c.City) AS WarehouseCount, SUM(od.Quantity * od.UnitPrice * (1 - od.Discount/100)) AS TotalRevenue, COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN d.Status = 'Доставлено' THEN d.DeliveryID END) AS SuccessfulDeliveries, COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN d.Status = 'Задержка' OR d.Status = 'Отменено' THEN d.DeliveryID END) AS ProblemDeliveries, (COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN d.Status = 'Доставлено' THEN d.DeliveryID END) / COUNT(DISTINCT d.DeliveryID) * 100) AS DeliverySuccessRate FROM Clients c JOIN Orders o ON c.ClientID = o.ClientID JOIN OrderDetails od ON o.OrderID = od.OrderID JOIN Shipments s ON o.OrderID = s.OrderID JOIN Deliveries d ON s.ShipmentID = d.ShipmentID GROUP BY c.Country, c.City LIMIT 6;
queries.gpt-4o_response:
SELECT 
    c.Country,
    c.City,
    COUNT(DISTINCT c.ClientID) AS NumberOfClients,
    COUNT(DISTINCT o.OrderID) AS NumberOfOrders,
    AVG(DATEDIFF(s.DeliveryDate, s.ShipmentDate)) AS AvgDeliveryTime,
    COUNT(DISTINCT w.WarehouseID) AS NumberOfWarehouses,
    SUM(o.TotalAmount) AS TotalRevenue,
    COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN d.Status = 'Доставлено' THEN d.DeliveryID END) AS SuccessfulDeliveries,
    COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN d.Status != 'Доставлено' THEN d.DeliveryID END) AS ProblematicDeliveries,
    COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN d.Status = 'Доставлено' THEN d.DeliveryID END) / COUNT(DISTINCT d.DeliveryID) * 100 AS SuccessRate
FROM 
    Clients c
JOIN 
    Orders o ON c.ClientID = o.ClientID
LEFT JOIN 
    Shipments s ON o.OrderID = s.OrderID
LEFT JOIN 
    Deliveries d ON s.ShipmentID = d.ShipmentID
LEFT JOIN 
    Warehouses w ON c.City = w.City
GROUP BY 
    c.Country, c.City
ORDER BY 
    TotalRevenue DESC
LIMIT 6;

queries.google/gemini-2.0-flash-001_response:
SELECT
    c.Country,
    c.City,
    COUNT(DISTINCT c.ClientID) AS NumberOfClients,
    COUNT(DISTINCT o.OrderID) AS NumberOfOrders,
    AVG(JULIANDAY(s.DeliveryDate) - JULIANDAY(s.ShipmentDate)) AS AverageDeliveryTime,
    COUNT(DISTINCT w.WarehouseID) AS NumberOfWarehouses,
    SUM(o.TotalAmount) AS TotalRevenue,
    SUM(CASE WHEN d.Status = 'Доставлено' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS SuccessfulDeliveries,
    SUM(CASE WHEN d.Status != 'Доставлено' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS ProblematicDeliveries,
    CAST(SUM(CASE WHEN d.Status = 'Доставлено' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS REAL) * 100 / COUNT(DISTINCT d.DeliveryID) AS DeliverySuccessRate
FROM Clients c
JOIN Orders o ON c.ClientID = o.ClientID
LEFT JOIN Shipments s ON o.OrderID = s.OrderID
LEFT JOIN Deliveries d ON s.ShipmentID = d.ShipmentID
LEFT JOIN Warehouses w ON c.City = w.City AND c.Country = w.Country
GROUP BY c.Country, c.City
ORDER BY TotalRevenue DESC
LIMIT 6;

queries.gigachat_response:
WITH RegionPerformance AS (
    SELECT 
        c.Country,
        c.City,
        COUNT(DISTINCT c.ClientID) AS NumClients,
        COUNT(DISTINCT o.OrderID) AS NumOrders,
        AVG(DATEDIFF(s.DeliveryDate, s.ShipmentDate)) AS AverageDeliveryTime,
        COUNT(DISTINCT w.WarehouseID) AS NumWarehousesInCity,
        SUM(p.TotalAmount) AS TotalRevenue,
        COUNT(CASE WHEN d.Status = 'Доставлено' THEN d.DeliveryID ELSE NULL END) AS SuccessfulDeliveries,
        COUNT(CASE WHEN d.Status != 'Доставлено' THEN d.DeliveryID ELSE NULL END) AS ProblematicDeliveries,
        ROUND((COUNT(CASE WHEN d.Status = 'Доставлено' THEN d.DeliveryID ELSE NULL END)::FLOAT / COUNT(DISTINCT d.DeliveryID)), 2) AS SuccessRate
    FROM 
        Clients c
    INNER JOIN 
        Orders o ON c.ClientID = o.ClientID
    INNER JOIN 
        Shipments s ON o.OrderID = s.OrderID
    INNER JOIN 
        Deliveries d ON s.ShipmentID = d.ShipmentID
    INNER JOIN 
        Payments p ON o.OrderID = p.OrderID
    INNER JOIN 
        Warehouses w ON c.City = w.City
    GROUP BY 
        c.Country, c.City
)
SELECT *
FROM RegionPerformance
ORDER BY TotalRevenue DESC
LIMIT 6;

queries.question: Каков комплексный анализ цепочки поставок с многоуровневыми метриками? Покажите топ-5 активных маршрутов с наибольшей стоимостью перевозимых товаров, включая идентификатор маршрута, начальную и конечную точку, расстояние, расчетное время в минутах, количество назначенных транспортных средств, общую вместимость транспортных средств, количество выполненных доставок, количество перевезенных отправлений, количество выполненных заказов, общее количество доставленных единиц, общую стоимость перевезенных товаров и среднее время транзита.
queries.sql_query: SELECT r.RouteID, r.StartLocation, r.EndLocation, r.Distance, TIME_TO_SEC(r.EstimatedTime)/60 AS EstimatedMinutes, COUNT(DISTINCT v.VehicleID) AS VehiclesAssigned, SUM(v.Capacity) AS TotalVehicleCapacity, COUNT(DISTINCT d.DeliveryID) AS DeliveriesCompleted, COUNT(DISTINCT s.ShipmentID) AS ShipmentsTransported, COUNT(DISTINCT o.OrderID) AS OrdersFulfilled, SUM(od.Quantity) AS TotalItemsDelivered, SUM(od.Quantity * od.UnitPrice * (1 - od.Discount/100)) AS TotalValueTransported, (SELECT AVG(DATEDIFF(d2.DeliveryDate, s2.ShipmentDate)) FROM Deliveries d2 JOIN Shipments s2 ON d2.ShipmentID = s2.ShipmentID JOIN Shippers sh2 ON s2.ShipperID = sh2.ShipperID JOIN Routes r2 ON sh2.ShipperID = r2.ShipperID WHERE r2.RouteID = r.RouteID) AS AvgTransitDays FROM Routes r JOIN Shippers sh ON r.ShipperID = sh.ShipperID JOIN Vehicles v ON sh.ShipperID = v.ShipperID JOIN Deliveries d ON v.VehicleID = d.VehicleID JOIN Shipments s ON d.ShipmentID = s.ShipmentID JOIN Orders o ON s.OrderID = o.OrderID JOIN OrderDetails od ON o.OrderID = od.OrderID WHERE r.Status = 'Активен' GROUP BY r.RouteID, r.StartLocation, r.EndLocation, r.Distance, r.EstimatedTime ORDER BY TotalValueTransported DESC, Distance ASC LIMIT 5;
queries.gpt-4o_response:
SELECT 
    r.RouteID,
    r.StartLocation,
    r.EndLocation,
    r.Distance,
    TIME_TO_SEC(r.EstimatedTime) / 60 AS EstimatedTimeInMinutes,
    COUNT(DISTINCT v.VehicleID) AS AssignedVehicles,
    SUM(v.Capacity) AS TotalVehicleCapacity,
    COUNT(DISTINCT d.DeliveryID) AS CompletedDeliveries,
    COUNT(DISTINCT s.ShipmentID) AS ShipmentsTransported,
    COUNT(DISTINCT o.OrderID) AS OrdersCompleted,
    SUM(od.Quantity) AS TotalUnitsDelivered,
    SUM(od.Quantity * od.UnitPrice * (1 - od.Discount / 100)) AS TotalValueOfGoods,
    AVG(TIMESTAMPDIFF(MINUTE, s.ShipmentDate, s.DeliveryDate)) AS AvgTransitTime
FROM 
    Routes r
JOIN 
    Shippers sh ON r.ShipperID = sh.ShipperID
JOIN 
    Shipments s ON sh.ShipperID = s.ShipperID
JOIN 
    Deliveries d ON s.ShipmentID = d.ShipmentID
JOIN 
    Vehicles v ON d.VehicleID = v.VehicleID
JOIN 
    Orders o ON s.OrderID = o.OrderID
JOIN 
    OrderDetails od ON o.OrderID = od.OrderID
WHERE 
    r.Status = 'Активен'
GROUP BY 
    r.RouteID, r.StartLocation, r.EndLocation, r.Distance, r.EstimatedTime
ORDER BY 
    TotalValueOfGoods DESC
LIMIT 5;

SELECT
    r.RouteID,
    r.StartLocation,
    r.EndLocation,
    r.Distance,
    CAST(STRFTIME('%M', r.EstimatedTime) AS INTEGER) + CAST(STRFTIME('%H', r.EstimatedTime) AS INTEGER) * 60 AS EstimatedTimeMinutes,
    COUNT(DISTINCT v.VehicleID) AS NumberOfVehiclesAssigned,
    SUM(v.Capacity) AS TotalVehiclesCapacity,
    COUNT(DISTINCT d.DeliveryID) AS NumberOfDeliveriesMade,
    COUNT(DISTINCT s.ShipmentID) AS NumberOfShipments,
    COUNT(DISTINCT o.OrderID) AS NumberOfOrders,
    SUM(od.Quantity) AS TotalQuantityDelivered,
    SUM(od.Quantity * od.UnitPrice * (1 - od.Discount / 100)) AS TotalGoodsValue,
    AVG(JULIANDAY(s.DeliveryDate) - JULIANDAY(s.ShipmentDate)) * 24 * 60 AS AverageTransitTimeMinutes
FROM
    Routes r
LEFT JOIN
    Vehicles v ON r.ShipperID = v.ShipperID
LEFT JOIN
    Deliveries d ON v.VehicleID = d.VehicleID
LEFT JOIN
    Shipments s ON d.ShipmentID = s.ShipmentID
LEFT JOIN
    Orders o ON s.OrderID = o.OrderID
LEFT JOIN
    OrderDetails od ON o.OrderID = od.OrderID
WHERE
    r.Status = 'Активен'
GROUP BY
    r.RouteID,
    r.StartLocation,
    r.EndLocation,
    r.Distance,
    r.EstimatedTime
ORDER BY
    TotalGoodsValue DESC
LIMIT 5;

    COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN d.Status = 'Доставлено' THEN d.DeliveryID END) AS CompletedDeliveries,
    COUNT(DISTINCT s.ShipmentID) AS ShipmentsCount,
    COUNT(DISTINCT o.OrderID) AS OrdersCount,
    SUM(od.Quantity) AS TotalUnitsDelivered,
    SUM(od.Quantity * od.UnitPrice * (1 - od.Discount/100)) AS TotalGoodsValue,
    AVG(DATEDIFF(d.DeliveryDate, s.ShipmentDate)) AS AvgTransitTimeDays
FROM 
    Routes r
LEFT JOIN 
    Vehicles v ON r.ShipperID = v.ShipperID
LEFT JOIN 
    Deliveries d ON v.VehicleID = d.VehicleID
LEFT JOIN 
    Shipments s ON d.ShipmentID = s.ShipmentID
LEFT JOIN 
    Orders o ON s.OrderID = o.OrderID
LEFT JOIN 
    OrderDetails od ON o.OrderID = od.OrderID
WHERE 
    r.Status = 'Активен'
GROUP BY 
    r.RouteID, r.StartLocation, r.EndLocation, r.Distance, r.EstimatedTime
ORDER BY

LIMIT 5;

queries.gigachat_response:
WITH ActiveRoutes AS (
    -- Select active routes with their details
    SELECT r.RouteID, r.StartLocation, r.EndLocation, r.Distance, TIME_TO_SEC(r.EstimatedTime)/60 AS EstimatedMinutes
    FROM Routes r
    WHERE r.Status = 'Активен'
), 
AssignedVehicles AS (
    -- Count vehicles assigned per route
    SELECT r.RouteID, COUNT(v.VehicleID) AS NumVehicles, SUM(v.Capacity) AS TotalVehicleCapacity
    FROM ActiveRoutes r
    INNER JOIN Vehicles v ON r.RouteID = v.ShipperID
    GROUP BY r.RouteID
), 
DeliveredShipments AS (
    -- Calculate deliveries completed per route
    SELECT r.RouteID, COUNT(s.ShipmentID) AS CompletedDeliveries
    FROM ActiveRoutes r
    INNER JOIN Shipments s ON r.RouteID = s.ShipperID AND s.Status IN ('Доставлено')
    GROUP BY r.RouteID
), 
ShippedOrders AS (
    -- Calculate shipped orders per route
    SELECT r.RouteID, COUNT(o.OrderID) AS ShippedOrders
    FROM ActiveRoutes r
    INNER JOIN Shipments s ON r.RouteID = s.ShipperID
    INNER JOIN Orders o ON s.OrderID = o.OrderID
    GROUP BY r.RouteID
), 
TotalUnitsShipped AS (
    -- Calculate total units shipped per route
    SELECT r.RouteID, SUM(od.Quantity) AS TotalUnitsShipped
    FROM ActiveRoutes r
    INNER JOIN Shipments s ON r.RouteID = s.ShipperID
    INNER JOIN Orders o ON s.OrderID = o.OrderID
    INNER JOIN OrderDetails od ON o.OrderID = od.OrderID
    GROUP BY r.RouteID
), 
TotalValueShipped AS (
    -- Calculate total value of goods shipped per route
    SELECT r.RouteID, SUM(od.Quantity * od.UnitPrice * (1 - od.Discount/100)) AS TotalValueShipped
    FROM ActiveRoutes r
    INNER JOIN Shipments s ON r.RouteID = s.ShipperID
    INNER JOIN Orders o ON s.OrderID = o.OrderID
    INNER JOIN OrderDetails od ON o.OrderID = od.OrderID
    GROUP BY r.RouteID
), 
AverageTransitTime AS (
    -- Calculate average transit time per route
    SELECT r.RouteID, AVG(TIMESTAMPDIFF(MINUTE, s.ShipmentDate, s.DeliveryDate)) AS AverageTransitTimeInMinutes
    FROM ActiveRoutes r
    INNER JOIN Shipments s ON r.RouteID = s.ShipperID
    WHERE s.DeliveryDate IS NOT NULL
    GROUP BY r.RouteID
)
-- Final result set combining all metrics
SELECT ar.RouteID, ar.StartLocation, ar.EndLocation, ar.Distance, ar.EstimatedMinutes, av.NumVehicles, av.TotalVehicleCapacity, ds.CompletedDeliveries, so.ShippedOrders, tus.TotalUnitsShipped, tvs.TotalValueShipped, att.AverageTransitTimeInMinutes
FROM ActiveRoutes ar
INNER JOIN AssignedVehicles av ON ar.RouteID = av.RouteID
LEFT JOIN DeliveredShipments ds ON ar.RouteID = ds.RouteID
LEFT JOIN ShippedOrders so ON ar.RouteID = so.RouteID
LEFT JOIN TotalUnitsShipped tus ON ar.RouteID = tus.RouteID
LEFT JOIN TotalValueShipped tvs ON ar.RouteID = tvs.RouteID
LEFT JOIN AverageTransitTime att ON ar.RouteID = att.RouteID
ORDER BY tvs.TotalValueShipped DESC
LIMIT 5;
queries.gigachat_response_ru:
WITH RouteMetrics AS (
    SELECT r.RouteID, r.StartLocation, r.EndLocation, r.Distance, TIME_TO_SEC(r.EstimatedTime)/60 AS EstimatedMinutes,
           COUNT(v.VehicleID) AS AssignedVehiclesCount,
           SUM(v.Capacity) AS TotalVehicleCapacity,
           COUNT(DISTINCT d.DeliveryID) AS CompletedDeliveries,
           COUNT(DISTINCT sh.ShipmentID) AS TransportedShipments,
           COUNT(DISTINCT o.OrderID) AS FulfilledOrders,
           SUM(od.Quantity) AS TotalUnitsDelivered,
           SUM(od.Quantity * od.UnitPrice * (1 - od.Discount/100)) AS TotalGoodsValue,
           AVG(TIMESTAMPDIFF(MINUTE, sh.ShipmentDate, sh.DeliveryDate)) AS AverageTransitTimeInMinutes
    FROM Routes r
    INNER JOIN Shipments sh ON r.ShipperID = sh.ShipperID
    INNER JOIN Deliveries d ON sh.ShipmentID = d.ShipmentID
    INNER JOIN Vehicles v ON sh.ShipperID = v.ShipperID
    INNER JOIN Orders o ON sh.OrderID = o.OrderID
    INNER JOIN OrderDetails od ON o.OrderID = od.OrderID
    GROUP BY r.RouteID, r.StartLocation, r.EndLocation, r.Distance, r.EstimatedTime
)
SELECT *
FROM RouteMetrics
ORDER BY TotalGoodsValue DESC
LIMIT 5;

queries.sql_query: SELECT s.SupplierID, s.Name AS SupplierName, s.Rating AS SupplierRating, COUNT(DISTINCT p.ProductID) AS ProductsSupplied, AVG(p.UnitPrice) AS AvgProductPrice, SUM(i.Quantity) AS TotalInventoryStock, COUNT(DISTINCT o.OrderID) AS OrdersWithSupplierProducts, SUM(od.Quantity) AS TotalItemsOrdered, (SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT r.ReturnID) FROM `Returns` r JOIN Products p2 ON r.ProductID = p2.ProductID WHERE p2.SupplierID = s.SupplierID) AS TotalReturns, (SELECT AVG(DATEDIFF(d.DeliveryDate, sh.ShipmentDate)) FROM Deliveries d JOIN Shipments sh ON d.ShipmentID = sh.ShipmentID JOIN Orders o2 ON sh.OrderID = o2.OrderID JOIN OrderDetails od2 ON o2.OrderID = od2.OrderID JOIN Products p3 ON od2.ProductID = p3.ProductID WHERE p3.SupplierID = s.SupplierID AND d.Status = 'Доставлено') AS AvgDeliveryDays, (SUM(od.Quantity * od.UnitPrice) - (SELECT COALESCE(SUM(r2.Quantity * od3.UnitPrice), 0) FROM `Returns` r2 JOIN OrderDetails od3 ON r2.OrderID = od3.OrderID AND r2.ProductID = od3.ProductID JOIN Products p4 ON od3.ProductID = p4.ProductID WHERE p4.SupplierID = s.SupplierID)) AS NetRevenue FROM Suppliers s JOIN Products p ON s.SupplierID = p.SupplierID LEFT JOIN Inventory i ON p.ProductID = i.ProductID LEFT JOIN OrderDetails od ON p.ProductID = od.ProductID LEFT JOIN Orders o ON od.OrderID = o.OrderID WHERE s.Country = 'Россия' GROUP BY s.SupplierID, s.Name, s.Rating LIMIT 7;

    INNER JOIN

    WHERE

queries.question: Каков анализ покупательского поведения клиентов с учетом сезонных паттернов? Покажите топ-12 клиентов с наибольшими суммами заказов за период с 2022 по 2023 год, сгруппированных по году и кварталу, включая идентификатор клиента, имя клиента, город, год и квартал заказа, количество заказов, общую сумму потраченных средств, среднюю стоимость заказа, разнообразие категорий заказанных продуктов, стоимость самого крупного единичного заказа, среднее время обработки заказа в днях, общее количество возвратов и сумму подтвержденных платежей.
queries.sql_query: SELECT c.ClientID, c.Name AS ClientName, c.City, YEAR(o.OrderDate) AS OrderYear, QUARTER(o.OrderDate) AS OrderQuarter, COUNT(DISTINCT o.OrderID) AS OrderCount, SUM(o.TotalAmount) AS TotalSpent, (SUM(o.TotalAmount) / COUNT(DISTINCT o.OrderID)) AS AvgOrderValue, (SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT p2.Category) FROM OrderDetails od2 JOIN Products p2 ON od2.ProductID = p2.ProductID JOIN Orders o2 ON od2.OrderID = o2.OrderID WHERE o2.ClientID = c.ClientID) AS CategoryDiversity, (SELECT MAX(od3.Quantity * od3.UnitPrice) FROM OrderDetails od3 JOIN Orders o3 ON od3.OrderID = o3.OrderID WHERE o3.ClientID = c.ClientID) AS LargestSinglePurchase, (SELECT AVG(DATEDIFF(o4.ShippedDate, o4.OrderDate)) FROM Orders o4 WHERE o4.ClientID = c.ClientID AND o4.ShippedDate IS NOT NULL) AS AvgProcessingDays, (SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT r.ReturnID) FROM `Returns` r JOIN Orders o5 ON r.OrderID = o5.OrderID WHERE o5.ClientID = c.ClientID) AS TotalReturns, (SELECT SUM(p.Amount) FROM Payments p JOIN Orders o6 ON p.OrderID = o6.OrderID WHERE o6.ClientID = c.ClientID AND p.Status = 'Завершено') AS ConfirmedPayments FROM Clients c JOIN Orders o ON c.ClientID = o.ClientID WHERE o.OrderDate BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2023-12-31' GROUP BY c.ClientID, c.Name, c.City, OrderYear, OrderQuarter ORDER BY OrderYear, OrderQuarter, TotalSpent DESC LIMIT 12;

    c.ClientID,
    c.Name AS ClientName,
    c.City,
    YEAR(o.OrderDate) AS OrderYear,
    QUARTER(o.OrderDate) AS OrderQuarter,
    COUNT(DISTINCT o.OrderID) AS OrderCount,
    SUM(o.TotalAmount) AS TotalSpent,
    AVG(o.TotalAmount) AS AvgOrderValue,
    COUNT(DISTINCT p.Category) AS ProductCategoryVariety,
    MAX(o.TotalAmount) AS LargestSingleOrder,
    AVG(DATEDIFF(o.ShippedDate, o.OrderDate)) AS AvgProcessingTimeDays,
    COUNT(DISTINCT r.ReturnID) AS TotalReturns,

queries.gigachat_response:
WITH QuarterlyData AS (
    SELECT 
        c.ClientID,
        c.Name AS ClientName,
        c.City,
        YEAR(o.OrderDate) AS Year,
        QUARTER(o.OrderDate) AS Quarter,
        COUNT(*) AS NumOrders,
        SUM(o.TotalAmount) AS TotalSpent,
        AVG(o.TotalAmount) AS AverageOrderValue,
        COUNT(DISTINCT p.Category) AS CategoriesDiversity,
        MAX(o.TotalAmount) AS LargestSingleOrder,
        AVG(DATEDIFF(o.ShippedDate, o.OrderDate)) AS AvgProcessingDays,
        COALESCE(SUM(r.Quantity), 0) AS TotalReturns,
        COALESCE(SUM(p.Amount), 0) AS ConfirmedPayments
    FROM 
        Clients c
    INNER JOIN 
        Orders o ON c.ClientID = o.ClientID
    INNER JOIN 
        OrderDetails od ON o.OrderID = od.OrderID
    INNER JOIN 
        Products p ON od.ProductID = p.ProductID
    LEFT JOIN 
        Returns r ON o.OrderID = r.OrderID AND r.Status IN ('Принято', 'Возврат выполнен')
    LEFT JOIN 
        Payments p ON o.OrderID = p.OrderID AND p.Status = 'Завершено'
    WHERE 
        o.OrderDate BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2023-12-31'
    GROUP BY 
        c.ClientID, c.Name, c.City, YEAR(o.OrderDate), QUARTER(o.OrderDate)
)
SELECT *
FROM QuarterlyData
ORDER BY TotalSpent DESC
LIMIT 12;

WITH ClientOrders AS (
    SELECT 
        o.ClientID,
        YEAR(o.OrderDate) AS Year,
        QUARTER(o.OrderDate) AS Quarter,
        COUNT(*) AS NumOrders,
        SUM(o.TotalAmount) AS TotalSpent,
        AVG(o.TotalAmount) AS AverageOrderValue,
        MAX(o.TotalAmount) AS LargestSingleOrder,
        COUNT(DISTINCT p.Category) AS UniqueCategoriesOrdered,
        AVG(DATEDIFF(o.ShippedDate, o.OrderDate)) AS AverageProcessingDays,
        COUNT(r.ReturnID) AS NumberOfReturns,
        SUM(CASE WHEN p.Status = 'Завершено' THEN p.Amount ELSE 0 END) AS ConfirmedPaymentsSum
    FROM Orders o
    INNER JOIN OrderDetails od ON o.OrderID = od.OrderID
    INNER JOIN Products p ON od.ProductID = p.ProductID
    LEFT JOIN `Returns` r ON o.OrderID = r.OrderID
    LEFT JOIN Payments p ON o.OrderID = p.OrderID
    WHERE o.OrderDate BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2023-12-31'
    GROUP BY o.ClientID, Year, Quarter
), TopClients AS (
    SELECT 
        co.ClientID,
        cl.Name AS ClientName,
        cl.City,
        co.Year,
        co.Quarter,
        co.NumOrders,
        co.TotalSpent,
        co.AverageOrderValue,
        co.UniqueCategoriesOrdered,
        co.LargestSingleOrder,
        co.AverageProcessingDays,
        co.NumberOfReturns,
        co.ConfirmedPaymentsSum
    FROM ClientOrders co
    INNER JOIN Clients cl ON co.ClientID = cl.ClientID
)
SELECT *
FROM TopClients
ORDER BY TotalSpent DESC
LIMIT 12;

queries.question: Каков анализ эффективности складов и оборачиваемости инвентаря? Покажите топ-3 склада с наивысшим коэффициентом оборачиваемости инвентаря, включая идентификатор и название склада, город, вместимость, имя менеджера, количество уникальных продуктов, общее количество инвентаря, процент использования вместимости, общее количество отгруженных единиц, количество обработанных отправлений, среднее время выполнения заказа в днях и коэффициент оборачиваемости инвентаря.
queries.sql_query: SELECT w.WarehouseID, w.Name AS WarehouseName, w.City, w.Capacity, e.FirstName || ' ' || e.LastName AS ManagerName, COUNT(DISTINCT i.ProductID) AS UniqueProducts, SUM(i.Quantity) AS TotalInventory, (SUM(i.Quantity) / w.Capacity * 100) AS CapacityUtilizationPercent, (SELECT SUM(od.Quantity) FROM OrderDetails od JOIN Products p ON od.ProductID = p.ProductID JOIN Inventory i2 ON p.ProductID = i2.ProductID WHERE i2.WarehouseID = w.WarehouseID) AS TotalItemsShipped, (SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT s.ShipmentID) FROM Shipments s JOIN Orders o ON s.OrderID = o.OrderID JOIN OrderDetails od2 ON o.OrderID = od2.OrderID JOIN Products p2 ON od2.ProductID = p2.ProductID JOIN Inventory i3 ON p2.ProductID = i3.ProductID WHERE i3.WarehouseID = w.WarehouseID) AS ShipmentsProcessed, (SELECT AVG(DATEDIFF(s2.ShipmentDate, o2.OrderDate)) FROM Shipments s2 JOIN Orders o2 ON s2.OrderID = o2.OrderID JOIN OrderDetails od3 ON o2.OrderID = od3.OrderID JOIN Products p3 ON od3.ProductID = p3.ProductID JOIN Inventory i4 ON p3.ProductID = i4.ProductID WHERE i4.WarehouseID = w.WarehouseID) AS AvgOrderFulfillmentDays, (SELECT SUM(od4.Quantity * od4.UnitPrice) / SUM(i5.Quantity * p4.UnitPrice) FROM Inventory i5 JOIN Products p4 ON i5.ProductID = p4.ProductID JOIN OrderDetails od4 ON p4.ProductID = od4.ProductID WHERE i5.WarehouseID = w.WarehouseID) AS InventoryTurnoverRatio FROM Warehouses w JOIN Employees e ON w.ManagerID = e.EmployeeID JOIN Inventory i ON w.WarehouseID = i.WarehouseID GROUP BY w.WarehouseID, w.Name, w.City, w.Capacity, ManagerName LIMIT 3;

    w.Name AS WarehouseName,
    w.City,
    w.Capacity,
    CONCAT(e.FirstName, ' ', e.LastName) AS ManagerName,
    COUNT(DISTINCT i.ProductID) AS UniqueProducts,
    SUM(i.Quantity) AS TotalInventory,
    (SUM(i.Quantity) / w.Capacity) * 100 AS CapacityUsagePercentage,
    COALESCE(SUM(od.Quantity), 0) AS TotalUnitsShipped,
    COUNT(DISTINCT s.ShipmentID) AS ShipmentsProcessed,
    AVG(DATEDIFF(o.ShippedDate, o.OrderDate)) AS AvgOrderFulfillmentTime,
    COALESCE(SUM(od.Quantity), 0) / NULLIF(SUM(i.Quantity), 0) AS InventoryTurnoverRatio
FROM

           FROM OrderDetails od 
           JOIN Orders o ON od.OrderID = o.OrderID 
           JOIN Shipments s ON o.OrderID = s.OrderID 
           WHERE s.Status = 'Доставлено' AND o.Status = 'Доставлено') / NULLIF(SUM(i.Quantity), 0), 2) AS InventoryTurnoverRatio
FROM 
    Warehouses w
JOIN 
    Employees e ON w.ManagerID = e.EmployeeID
JOIN 
    Inventory i ON w.WarehouseID = i.WarehouseID
LEFT JOIN 
    Shipments s ON w.WarehouseID = s.ShipmentID
GROUP BY 
    w.WarehouseID, w.Name, w.City, w.Capacity, ManagerName
ORDER BY 
    InventoryTurnoverRatio DESC
LIMIT 3;

WITH WarehouseMetrics AS (
    -- Calculate warehouse metrics including inventory turnover rate
    SELECT 
        w.WarehouseID,
        w.Name AS WarehouseName,
        w.City,
        w.Capacity,
        e.FirstName || ' ' || e.LastName AS ManagerName,
        COUNT(DISTINCT inv.ProductID) AS UniqueProductsCount,
        SUM(inv.Quantity) AS TotalInventoryQty,
        ROUND((SUM(inv.Quantity)::DECIMAL / w.Capacity), 2) * 100 AS CapacityUsagePercentage,
        COALESCE(SUM(od.Quantity), 0) AS TotalShippedUnits,
        COUNT(DISTINCT sh.ShipmentID) AS ProcessedShipments,
        AVG(DATE_PART('day', sh.DeliveryDate::timestamp - sh.ShipmentDate::timestamp)) AS AverageOrderFulfillmentDays,
        ROUND(COALESCE(SUM(od.Quantity), 0)::DECIMAL / SUM(inv.Quantity), 2) AS InventoryTurnoverRatio
    FROM 
        Warehouses w
    INNER JOIN 
        Inventory inv ON w.WarehouseID = inv.WarehouseID
    LEFT JOIN 
        Employees e ON w.ManagerID = e.EmployeeID
    LEFT JOIN 
        OrderDetails od ON inv.ProductID = od.ProductID
    LEFT JOIN 
        Orders o ON od.OrderID = o.OrderID
    LEFT JOIN 
        Shipments sh ON o.OrderID = sh.OrderID
    GROUP BY 
        w.WarehouseID, w.Name, w.City, w.Capacity, e.FirstName, e.LastName
)
-- Select top 3 warehouses based on inventory turnover ratio
SELECT *
FROM WarehouseMetrics
ORDER BY InventoryTurnoverRatio DESC
LIMIT 3;

queries.question: Какова производительность автопарка и эффективность доставки? Покажите топ-6 транспортных средств с наивысшим процентом успешных доставок и вместимостью более 1000 единиц, включая идентификатор транспортного средства, номерной знак, модель, вместимость, статус, название перевозчика, общее количество доставок, количество успешных доставок, процент успешных доставок, среднее время доставки в днях, общую стоимость доставленных товаров, общее количество доставленных единиц и количество обслуживаемых маршрутов.
queries.sql_query: SELECT v.VehicleID, v.LicensePlate, v.Model, v.Capacity, v.Status, sh.Name AS ShipperName, COUNT(DISTINCT d.DeliveryID) AS TotalDeliveries, COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN d.Status = 'Доставлено' THEN d.DeliveryID END) AS CompletedDeliveries, (COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN d.Status = 'Доставлено' THEN d.DeliveryID END) / COUNT(DISTINCT d.DeliveryID) * 100) AS SuccessRate, (SELECT AVG(DATEDIFF(d2.DeliveryDate, s.ShipmentDate)) FROM Deliveries d2 JOIN Shipments s ON d2.ShipmentID = s.ShipmentID WHERE d2.VehicleID = v.VehicleID AND d2.Status = 'Доставлено') AS AvgDeliveryDays, (SELECT SUM(od.Quantity * p.UnitPrice) FROM OrderDetails od JOIN Products p ON od.ProductID = p.ProductID JOIN Orders o ON od.OrderID = o.OrderID JOIN Shipments s2 ON o.OrderID = s2.OrderID JOIN Deliveries d3 ON s2.ShipmentID = d3.ShipmentID WHERE d3.VehicleID = v.VehicleID) AS TotalValueDelivered, (SELECT SUM(od2.Quantity) FROM OrderDetails od2 JOIN Orders o2 ON od2.OrderID = o2.OrderID JOIN Shipments s3 ON o2.OrderID = s3.OrderID JOIN Deliveries d4 ON s3.ShipmentID = d4.ShipmentID WHERE d4.VehicleID = v.VehicleID) AS TotalItemsDelivered, (SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT r.RouteID) FROM Routes r JOIN Shippers sh2 ON r.ShipperID = sh2.ShipperID WHERE sh2.ShipperID = v.ShipperID) AS RoutesServiced FROM Vehicles v JOIN Shippers sh ON v.ShipperID = sh.ShipperID LEFT JOIN Deliveries d ON v.VehicleID = d.VehicleID GROUP BY v.VehicleID, v.LicensePlate, v.Model, v.Capacity, v.Status, sh.Name, TotalValueDelivered DESC LIMIT 6;

FROM

WITH SuccessfulDeliveries AS (
    SELECT 
        v.VehicleID,
        v.LicensePlate,
        v.Model,
        v.Capacity,
        v.Status,
        sh.Name AS ShipperName,
        COUNT(*) AS TotalDeliveries,
        COUNT(CASE WHEN d.Status = 'Доставлено' THEN 1 ELSE NULL END) AS SuccessDeliveries,
        ROUND((COUNT(CASE WHEN d.Status = 'Доставлено' THEN 1 ELSE NULL END)::DECIMAL / COUNT(*)) * 100, 2) AS SuccessPercentage,
        AVG(DATE_PART('day', AGE(d.DeliveryDate, s.ShipmentDate)))::NUMERIC(10,2) AS AverageDeliveryDays,
        COALESCE(SUM(od.Quantity), 0) AS TotalUnitsDelivered,
        COALESCE(SUM(od.Quantity * od.UnitPrice * (1 - od.Discount/100)), 0) AS TotalValueOfGoods,
        COUNT(DISTINCT r.RouteID) AS ServicedRoutesCount
    FROM Vehicles v
    INNER JOIN Deliveries d ON v.VehicleID = d.VehicleID
    INNER JOIN Shipments s ON d.ShipmentID = s.ShipmentID
    INNER JOIN Shippers sh ON s.ShipperID = sh.ShipperID
    INNER JOIN OrderDetails od ON s.OrderID = od.OrderID
    LEFT JOIN Routes r ON sh.ShipperID = r.ShipperID
    WHERE v.Capacity > 1000 AND d.Status IN ('Доставлено', 'В пути')
    GROUP BY v.VehicleID, v.LicensePlate, v.Model, v.Capacity, v.Status, sh.Name
)
SELECT *
FROM SuccessfulDeliveries
ORDER BY SuccessPercentage DESC, TotalDeliveries DESC
LIMIT 6;

queries.question: Каков комплексный анализ платежей и возвратов с учетом метрик прибыльности клиентов? Покажите топ-8 клиентов с наибольшей чистой выручкой, зарегистрированных до 2023 года и имеющих более 3 заказов, включая идентификатор клиента, имя клиента, город, страну, количество дней как клиент, общее количество заказов, общую стоимость заказов, сумму подтвержденных платежей, сумму отмененных платежей, общее количество возвратов, стоимость возвращенных товаров, чистую выручку с учетом возвратов и среднее время от заказа до доставки в днях.
queries.sql_query: SELECT c.ClientID, c.Name AS ClientName, c.City, c.Country, DATEDIFF(CURRENT_DATE, c.RegistrationDate) AS DaysAsCustomer, COUNT(DISTINCT o.OrderID) AS TotalOrders, SUM(o.TotalAmount) AS GrossOrderValue, (SELECT SUM(p.Amount) FROM Payments p JOIN Orders o2 ON p.OrderID = o2.OrderID WHERE o2.ClientID = c.ClientID AND p.Status = 'Завершено') AS ConfirmedPayments, (SELECT SUM(p2.Amount) FROM Payments p2 JOIN Orders o3 ON p2.OrderID = o3.OrderID WHERE o3.ClientID = c.ClientID AND p2.Status = 'Отменено') AS CanceledPayments, (SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT r.ReturnID) FROM `Returns` r JOIN Orders o4 ON r.OrderID = o4.OrderID WHERE o4.ClientID = c.ClientID) AS TotalReturns, (SELECT SUM(r2.Quantity * od.UnitPrice) FROM `Returns` r2 JOIN OrderDetails od ON r2.OrderID = od.OrderID AND r2.ProductID = od.ProductID JOIN Orders o5 ON r2.OrderID = o5.OrderID WHERE o5.ClientID = c.ClientID) AS ReturnValue, (SUM(o.TotalAmount) - (SELECT COALESCE(SUM(r3.Quantity * od2.UnitPrice), 0) FROM `Returns` r3 JOIN OrderDetails od2 ON r3.OrderID = od2.OrderID AND r3.ProductID = od2.ProductID JOIN Orders o6 ON r3.OrderID = o6.OrderID WHERE o6.ClientID = c.ClientID)) AS NetRevenue, (SELECT AVG(DATEDIFF(s.DeliveryDate, o7.OrderDate)) FROM Shipments s JOIN Orders o7 ON s.OrderID = o7.OrderID WHERE o7.ClientID = c.ClientID AND s.Status = 'Доставлено') AS AvgOrderToDeliveryDays FROM Clients c JOIN Orders o ON c.ClientID = o.ClientID WHERE c.RegistrationDate < '2023-01-01' GROUP BY c.ClientID, c.Name, c.City, c.Country, c.RegistrationDate, TotalReturns ASC LIMIT 8;
queries.gpt-4o_response:
SELECT 
    c.ClientID,
    c.Name AS ClientName,
    c.City,
    c.Country,
    DATEDIFF(CURDATE(), c.RegistrationDate) AS DaysAsClient,
    COUNT(DISTINCT o.OrderID) AS TotalOrders,
    SUM(o.TotalAmount) AS TotalOrderValue,
    SUM(CASE WHEN p.Status = 'Завершено' THEN p.Amount ELSE 0 END) AS ConfirmedPayments,
    SUM(CASE WHEN p.Status = 'Отменено' THEN p.Amount ELSE 0 END) AS CanceledPayments,
    COUNT(DISTINCT r.ReturnID) AS TotalReturns,
    SUM(r.Quantity * od.UnitPrice * (1 - od.Discount / 100)) AS ReturnedValue,
    SUM(o.TotalAmount) - SUM(r.Quantity * od.UnitPrice * (1 - od.Discount / 100)) AS NetRevenue,
    AVG(DATEDIFF(o.ShippedDate, o.OrderDate)) AS AvgOrderToDeliveryDays
FROM 
    Clients c
JOIN 
    Orders o ON c.ClientID = o.ClientID
LEFT JOIN 
    Payments p ON o.OrderID = p.OrderID
LEFT JOIN 
    `Returns` r ON o.OrderID = r.OrderID
LEFT JOIN 
    OrderDetails od ON r.OrderID = od.OrderID AND r.ProductID = od.ProductID
WHERE 
    c.RegistrationDate < '2023-01-01'
GROUP BY 
    c.ClientID, c.Name, c.City, c.Country
HAVING 
    COUNT(DISTINCT o.OrderID) > 3
ORDER BY 
    NetRevenue DESC
LIMIT 8;

    SELECT 
        s.ShipperID,
        TIMESTAMPDIFF(DAY, sh.ShippedDate, sh.DeliveryDate) AS DelayDays

    JOIN Orders o ON sh.OrderID = o.OrderID
    JOIN Shippers s ON sh.ShipperID = s.ShipperID
    WHERE sh.DeliveryDate >= NOW() - INTERVAL 6 MONTH AND sh.DeliveryDate IS NOT NULL AND sh.DeliveryDate > sh.ShippedDate
), AverageDelays AS (
    SELECT 
        ShipperID,
        AVG(DelayDays) AS AverageDelay
    FROM DelayedDeliveries

    HAVING COUNT(*) >= 5

ORDER BY ad.AverageDelay ASC

queries.sql_query: SELECT p.ProductID, p.Name, SUM(od.Quantity) AS SoldUnits, SUM(i.Quantity) AS StockUnits, SUM(od.Quantity)/NULLIF(SUM(i.Quantity),0) AS TurnoverRatio FROM Products p JOIN OrderDetails od ON p.ProductID = od.ProductID JOIN Orders o ON od.OrderID = o.OrderID JOIN Inventory i ON p.ProductID = i.ProductID WHERE o.OrderDate BETWEEN '2023-01-01' AND '2023-12-31' GROUP BY p.ProductID, p.Name HAVING SUM(od.Quantity) >= 100 ORDER BY TurnoverRatio DESC LIMIT 6;

    p.Name AS ProductName, 
    SUM(od.Quantity) AS TotalSoldUnits,

WHERE

queries.gigachat_response:
WITH OrderedUnits AS (
    SELECT 
        r.OrderID,
        r.ProductID,
        SUM(od.Quantity) AS OrderedQty
    FROM 
        Orders o
    INNER JOIN 
        OrderDetails od ON o.OrderID = od.OrderID
    WHERE 
        o.OrderDate >= DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 6 MONTH)
    GROUP BY 
        r.OrderID, r.ProductID
), ReturnedUnits AS (
    SELECT 
        r.OrderID,
        r.ProductID,
        SUM(r.Quantity) AS ReturnedQty
    FROM 
        `Returns` r
    WHERE 
        r.ReturnDate >= DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 6 MONTH)
    GROUP BY 
        r.OrderID, r.ProductID
), ClientReturnRates AS (
    SELECT 
        c.ClientID,
        c.Name AS ClientName,
        COALESCE(SUM(ReturnedUnits.ReturnedQty), 0) AS TotalReturnedUnits,
        COALESCE(SUM(OrderedUnits.OrderedQty), 0) AS TotalOrderedUnits,
        ROUND(COALESCE(SUM(ReturnedUnits.ReturnedQty), 0) / COALESCE(NULLIF(SUM(OrderedUnits.OrderedQty), 0), 1) * 100, 2) AS ReturnPercentage
    FROM 
        Clients c
    LEFT JOIN 
        Orders o ON c.ClientID = o.ClientID
    LEFT JOIN 
        OrderedUnits ON o.OrderID = OrderedUnits.OrderID
    LEFT JOIN 
        ReturnedUnits ON o.OrderID = ReturnedUnits.OrderID AND OrderedUnits.ProductID = ReturnedUnits.ProductID
    WHERE 
        o.OrderDate >= DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 6 MONTH)
    GROUP BY 
        c.ClientID, c.Name
)
SELECT *
FROM 
    ClientReturnRates
WHERE 
    TotalOrderedUnits > 0
ORDER BY 
    ReturnPercentage DESC
LIMIT 5;

queries.sql_query: SELECT v.VehicleID, v.LicensePlate, v.Model, COUNT(d.DeliveryID) AS TotalDeliveries, DATEDIFF(MAX(d.DeliveryDate), MIN(d.DeliveryDate)) AS OperDays, COUNT(d.DeliveryID)/NULLIF(DATEDIFF(MAX(d.DeliveryDate), MIN(d.DeliveryDate)),0) AS UtilizationRate FROM Vehicles v JOIN Deliveries d ON v.VehicleID = d.VehicleID WHERE d.DeliveryDate >= DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 12 MONTH) GROUP BY v.VehicleID, v.LicensePlate, v.Model HAVING COUNT(d.DeliveryID) >= 3 ORDER BY UtilizationRate DESC LIMIT 4;

queries.gigachat_response:
WITH DeliveryStats AS (
    SELECT 
        v.VehicleID,
        COUNT(*) AS NumDeliveries,
        MIN(d.DeliveryDate) AS MinDeliveryDate,
        MAX(d.DeliveryDate) AS MaxDeliveryDate
    FROM Vehicles v
    INNER JOIN Deliveries d ON v.VehicleID = d.VehicleID
    WHERE d.DeliveryDate >= DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 1 YEAR)
    GROUP BY v.VehicleID
    HAVING COUNT(*) >= 3
), UsageCoefficient AS (
    SELECT 
        ds.VehicleID,
        ds.NumDeliveries,
        TIMESTAMPDIFF(DAY, ds.MinDeliveryDate, ds.MaxDeliveryDate) + 1 AS DaysBetweenFirstAndLastDelivery,
        ROUND(ds.NumDeliveries / (TIMESTAMPDIFF(DAY, ds.MinDeliveryDate, ds.MaxDeliveryDate) + 1), 2) AS UsageCoefficient
    FROM DeliveryStats ds
)
SELECT 
    vc.LicensePlate,
    vc.Model,
    uc.UsageCoefficient
FROM UsageCoefficient uc
INNER JOIN Vehicles vc ON uc.VehicleID = vc.VehicleID
ORDER BY uc.UsageCoefficient DESC
LIMIT 4;

       COUNT(d.DeliveryID) / (TIMESTAMPDIFF(DAY, MIN(d.DeliveryDate), MAX(d.DeliveryDate)) + 1) AS UtilizationCoefficient
FROM Vehicles v
JOIN Deliveries d ON v.VehicleID = d.VehicleID
WHERE d.DeliveryDate >= CURDATE() - INTERVAL 1 YEAR
GROUP BY v.VehicleID, v.Model
HAVING COUNT(d.DeliveryID) >= 3
ORDER BY UtilizationCoefficient DESC
LIMIT 4;

ORDER BY AverageSpeedKMPerHour DESC
LIMIT 7;

queries.question: Какие топ-5 категорий товаров имеют наивысший уровень возвратов за последние 3 месяца, включая общее количество проданных единиц, вернувшихся единиц и процент возвратов (убывающий порядок)?
queries.sql_query: SELECT p.Category, SUM(od.Quantity) AS SoldUnits, SUM(ret.Quantity) AS ReturnedUnits, SUM(ret.Quantity)/NULLIF(SUM(od.Quantity),0)*100 AS ReturnRate FROM Products p JOIN OrderDetails od ON p.ProductID = od.ProductID JOIN Orders o ON od.OrderID = o.OrderID LEFT JOIN Returns ret ON o.OrderID = ret.OrderID AND ret.ReturnDate >= DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 3 MONTH) WHERE o.OrderDate >= DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 3 MONTH) GROUP BY p.Category HAVING SUM(od.Quantity) > 0 ORDER BY ReturnRate DESC LIMIT 5;
queries.gpt-4o_response:
SELECT 
    p.Category,
    SUM(od.Quantity) AS TotalSoldUnits,
    SUM(r.Quantity) AS ReturnedUnits,
    (SUM(r.Quantity) / SUM(od.Quantity) * 100) AS ReturnPercentage
FROM 
    Returns r
JOIN 
    OrderDetails od ON r.OrderID = od.OrderID AND r.ProductID = od.ProductID
JOIN 
    Products p ON r.ProductID = p.ProductID
WHERE 
    r.ReturnDate >= DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 3 MONTH)
GROUP BY 
    p.Category
ORDER BY 
    ReturnPercentage DESC
LIMIT 5;

WITH ReturnedUnits AS (
    SELECT r.Category, SUM(r.ReturnedQty) AS TotalReturnedQty
    FROM (
        SELECT p.Category, SUM(r.Quantity) AS ReturnedQty
        FROM `Returns` r
        JOIN Products p ON r.ProductID = p.ProductID
        WHERE r.ReturnDate >= DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 3 MONTH)
        GROUP BY p.Category
    ) r
), SoldUnits AS (
    SELECT p.Category, SUM(od.Quantity) AS TotalSoldQty
    FROM OrderDetails od
    JOIN Products p ON od.ProductID = p.ProductID
    JOIN Orders o ON od.OrderID = o.OrderID
    WHERE o.OrderDate >= DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 3 MONTH)
    GROUP BY p.Category
)
SELECT ru.Category, su.TotalSoldQty, ru.TotalReturnedQty, ROUND((ru.TotalReturnedQty / su.TotalSoldQty) * 100, 2) AS ReturnPercentage

ORDER BY ReturnPercentage DESC
LIMIT 5;

queries.question: Какие топ-6 городов клиентов имеют наибольшую среднюю сумму заказа и среднее время доставки (в днях) за последние 12 месяцев при не менее 4 доставленных заказах, отсортированные по средней сумме заказа (убывающий порядок)?
queries.sql_query: SELECT cl.City, COUNT(o.OrderID) AS DeliveredOrders, ROUND(AVG(o.TotalAmount),2) AS AvgOrderAmount, AVG(DATEDIFF(s.DeliveryDate, s.ShipmentDate)) AS AvgDeliveryDays FROM Clients cl JOIN Orders o ON cl.ClientID = o.ClientID JOIN Shipments s ON o.OrderID = s.OrderID WHERE o.Status = 'Доставлено' AND s.DeliveryDate >= DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 12 MONTH) GROUP BY cl.City HAVING COUNT(o.OrderID) >= 4 ORDER BY AvgOrderAmount DESC LIMIT 6;
queries.gpt-4o_response:
SELECT c.City, 
       AVG(o.TotalAmount) AS AvgOrderAmount, 
       AVG(DATEDIFF(o.ShippedDate, o.OrderDate)) AS AvgDeliveryTimeDays
FROM Clients c
JOIN Orders o ON c.ClientID = o.ClientID
JOIN Shipments s ON o.OrderID = s.OrderID
WHERE o.Status = 'Доставлено'
  AND o.OrderDate >= DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 12 MONTH)
GROUP BY c.City
HAVING COUNT(o.OrderID) >= 4
ORDER BY AvgOrderAmount DESC
LIMIT 6;

WITH OrderStats AS (
    SELECT 
        c.City,
        AVG(o.TotalAmount) AS AverageOrderValue,
        AVG(DATEDIFF(s.DeliveryDate, o.OrderDate)) AS AverageDeliveryDays,
        COUNT(*) AS NumDeliveredOrders
    FROM 
        Orders o
    INNER JOIN 
        Clients c ON o.ClientID = c.ClientID
    INNER JOIN 
        Shipments s ON o.OrderID = s.OrderID
    WHERE 
        o.OrderDate >= DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 12 MONTH) AND 
        s.Status = 'Доставлено'
    GROUP BY 
        c.City
    HAVING 
        NumDeliveredOrders >= 4
)
SELECT *
FROM OrderStats
ORDER BY AverageOrderValue DESC
LIMIT 6;
